ADDFRAME(6D)                                       ADDFRAME(6D)





NAME
       addframe - add a border to an image

SYNOPSIS
       addframe inimage outimage [width [r g b]]

DESCRIPTION
       addframe adds a constant width border to a monochrome or
       color image. The default  width  is  1  pixel,  and  the
       default color is black.



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004              ADDFRAME(6D)
